Package org.agilewiki.utils.cow

A basic COW database with support for multiple blocks.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Transaction
    A transaction simply transforms a map list.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BlockReference
    Holds a block number, block length and checksum.
    BlockReferenceFactory
    Defines how a BlockReference is serialized / deserialized.
    Db
    A database that supports multiple blocks.
    DbFactoryRegistry
    Initialize the factory registry.

Package org.agilewiki.utils.cow Description

A basic COW database with support for multiple blocks. Transaction logging is not implemented, recovery depending on one of the two areas where the root block is written being valid.
